1.0.name: wordpress/onbile
1.0.description:
Mobile version of your wordpress.

with Onbile your wordpress have a Mobile Version with this plugin your users can visit your wordpress with theirs smartphones and visualize all content in a friendly way. Feateures - Multiple themes.

  • Multiple configuration.

  • Total customization.

  • Change colors, texts, icons, background, etc.

  • Your users can comment.

  • compatible with all smarts phones ( Android, iPhone, blackberry, nokia, opera mini, etc.. )

System recommandations: WordPress 2.7 or higher. PHP version 4.4.2 or higher. MySQL version 4.1 or higher.
